com.labyrinthconquest.game.actors

Class MenuActor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
      • com.labyrinthconquest.game.actors.MenuActor

  • public class MenuActor
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
    Menu actor represents an object in game menus, that can be clicked and so on
